properties.name: application.elasticsearch.index
properties.description: Name of the active elasticsearch index.

properties.name: application.baseUrl
properties.description: The base for building URLs in e-mails, for example 'https://einnsyn.no', 'https://test.einnsyn.no'.

properties.name: application.email.from
properties.description: The from: address for emails sent by the application.

properties.name: application.userSecretExpirationTime
properties.description: Time before a user secret expires.

properties.name: application.innsynskravRetryInterval
properties.description: Interval between retries after failed innsynskrav-sending.

properties.name: application.jwt.encryption-secret
properties.description: JWT Secret. This must be a 256 bit HMAC hash.

properties.name: application.apikey.root-key
properties.description: ID of the root API key.

properties.name: application.apikey.root-secret
properties.description: Default root API secret. This is used to initialize a fresh database, and may be changed later.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.reindexer.getBatchSize
properties.description: The batch size for checking if ES documents exists in the database.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.reindexer.indexBatchSize
properties.description: The batch size for indexing new documents.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.reindexer.cron.update-outdated
properties.description: Schedule for updating outdated ES documents

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.reindexer.cron.removeStale
properties.description: Schedule for removing documents from ES that are not in the database.

properties.name: application.elasticsearch.concurrency
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrent index() requests to elasticsearch.
